name: Breaking Fat
description:
"Fight against evil doctor to break the curse and get back your original body!! If doctor's minions touch you, you'll be one of them and you'll be much slower in this moment... but not all is lost... you must find the gold key to scape."

Game developed during the Ludum Date #35 (http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-35/?action=preview&uid=59433)

Designed and programmed by Santi Andrade (@SantiHisteria | https://histeriagamedev.wordpress.com)

Engine: Unity 5.3

Controls:
  • [Left/Right] arrows to move.
  • [Space] key to jump.
  • [Up] key to enter in a door.

Special thanks to all the authors who donate their work (free licenses) and have allowed me to create the graphics and sound of the game. They are:
